entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow early in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains early in the morning. Wind becoming light early in the morning. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 17 in the evening then falling. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 17 in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
